fates.requirement: When user clicks 'Add to Cart' button on a product card, the product is added to the cart state and the cart icon badge updates to show the new total item count.
fates.reason: All axes present: trigger (click button), state (cart update), outcome (badge update). High satisfaction score.
fates.explanation: Intent fully specifies trigger, state mutation, and observable outcome. No ambiguity detected.

fates.requirement: The product list page displays products in a 3-column grid on desktop (viewport > 1024px) and a single column on mobile (viewport < 768px).
fates.reason: Conditional trigger (breakpoints), layout state, specific measurable outcome (column count).
fates.explanation: Intent provides specific breakpoint values and expected layout behavior.

fates.requirement: When user enters text in the search field, a debounced search (300ms delay) filters the product list to show only products whose name contains the search text (case-insensitive).
fates.reason: Explicit trigger (input + debounce), filter state, specific matching behavior.
fates.explanation: Intent specifies timing (300ms), matching logic (contains, case-insensitive), and outcome.

fates.requirement: Each product card displays: product image (200x200px), product name (max 2 lines with ellipsis), price in USD format ($X.XX), and 'Add to Cart' button.
fates.reason: Enumerated elements with specific constraints (dimensions, format, truncation).
fates.explanation: Intent provides specific dimensions, formatting rules, and element enumeration.

fates.requirement: When cart is empty, the cart page displays 'Your cart is empty' message with a 'Continue Shopping' link that navigates to /products.
fates.reason: Conditional trigger (empty cart), specific message content, specific navigation target.
fates.explanation: Intent provides exact text, link behavior, and navigation destination.
